Name: S1:Red Petal Flash
Effect: Increases damage by 3% for 30 seconds after inflicting 450,000 damage.

Name: S1:Blue Ocean Flash
Effect: Recover 4% HP every second for 30 seconds after taking 600 damage.

Name: S1:White Snow Flash
Effect: Increases Active PP Recovery by 20% for 30 seconds after using 150 PP.

Name: S1:Yellow Moon Flash
Effect: Decreases PP consumption by 8% for 20 seconds after performing a Just Guard.

Name: S1:Green Leaf Flash
Effect: A barrier that decreases damage taken by 8% and negates knockback appears and disappears every 20 seconds.

Name: S1:Black Shadow Flash
Effect: Increases Natural PP Recovery for 20 seconds after standing still for 5 seconds.

Name: S1:Rupturing Excess
Effect: Increases Active PP Recovery by 40% when attacking breakable parts.

Name: S1:Photon Balance
Effect: Increases PP consumption by 8% but increases PA/Technique damage by 4%.

Name: S1:Photon Balance 2
Effect: Increases PP consumption by 8% but increases PA/Technique damage by 6%.

Name: S1:Double-Edged Sword
Effect: Increases Power by 4% but take 8% more damage when weapon is drawn.

Name: S1:Collaborator Liberator
Effect: If there are two or more party members, decreases PP consumption by 8% (2 Members), +10% Critical Hit Rate (3 Members), and increases Power by 3% (4 Members). Bonuses only work on self.

Name: S1:Collaborator Liberator 2
Effect: If there are two or more party members, decreases PP consumption by 10% (2 Members), +??% Critical Hit Rate (3 Members), and increases Power by 4% (4 Members). Bonuses only work on self.

Name: S1:Immediate Strike
Effect: Increases Critical Hit Rate by 2% for each successive Just Attack, up to 20%. Bonus is lost when a non-Just Attack is performed.

Name: S1:Flowing Exhilaration
Effect: Recover 40% of your maximum HP every 40s.

Name: S1:Phantasmal Intent
Effect: Increases Power based on the Photon Blast Gauge. Maxes at 3%.

Name: S1:Powering Intent
Effect: Increases damage dealt to bosses by 4%.

Name: S1:Immediate Intent
Effect: Increases damage when performing successive Just Attacks (3% MAX).

Name: S1:Rupturing Intent
Effect: Increases damage against breakable parts by 4%.

Name: S1:Vigor Enhancement
Effect: Increases HP recovered from self-healing effects by 40%.

Name: S1:Brilliant Intent
Effect: Boosts damage by 3% while PP is at 40% or above.

Name: S1:Brilliant Intent 2
Effect: Boosts damage by 5% while PP is at 40% or above.

Name: S1:Augment Intent
Effect: Increases Power by 0.5% for each Special Ability attached to this weapon. Maxes at 4%.

Name: S1:Augment Intent 2
Effect: Increases Power by 0.75% for each Special Ability attached to this weapon. Maxes at 6%.

Name: S1:Brilliant Ruin
Effect: Recover 3 PP when an enemy near you is defeated.

Name: S1:Brilliant Ruin 2
Effect: Recover 4 PP when an enemy near you is defeated.

Name: S1:Sturdy Intent
Effect: Increases damage by 4% if your weapon's element or equipped Guard Ring matches the enemy's elemental weakness.

Name: S1:Lethal Intent
Effect: Reduces HP by 5% every 20 seconds and increases Power by 4%.

Name: S1:Lethal Intent
Effect: Increases Power every 3 times you are attacked (1% on 3-5 hits, 3% on 6-8 hits, 10% on 9 hits). Upon being attacked a 10th time, releases an explosion that reduces your HP to 1 and massively damages all nearby targets.

Name: S1:Eclipsing Decay
Effect: Grant a 25% chance to inflict the Jellen status when attacking an enemy.

Name: S1:Strike Boost
Effect: Increases Power by 1% for every 60 S-ATK affixed to this weapon. Increases Power by an additional 2% if at least 200 S-ATK is affixed to this weapon.

Name: S1:Shoot Boost
Effect: Increases Power by 1% for every 60 R-ATK affixed to this weapon. Increases Power by an additional 2% if at least 200 R-ATK is affixed to this weapon.

Name: S1:Tech Boost
Effect: Increases Power by 1% for every 60 T-ATK affixed to this weapon. Increases Power by an additional 2% if at least 200 T-ATK is affixed to this weapon.

Name: S1:Flowing Intent
Effect: Increases power every second. Maxes at 4% after 30 seconds.

Name: S1:Spirited Response
Effect: Increases PP regeneration rate by 80% while sheathed. Reduces PP regeneration rate by 100% while unsheathed.

Name: S1:Phanatical Advantage
Effect: Increases power by 5% and reduces damage taken by 12% in the "Quest Solo Training: Phanatical Phantoms".

Effect: Increase Wind Attribute and Mirage Resistance (30). Increase damage by 3% against enemies weak to Wind.

Effect: Increases damage against breakable parts by 4%.

Effect: Recover 10 PP when successfully performing a Just Guard.

Effect: Survive one fatal hit with 1 HP remaining. Does not activate if HP is at 1. Activates once per Quest.

Name: S4:Radiant Response
Effect: Improve Natural PP Recovery, Active PP Recovery, and reduces PP consumption based on maximum PP. Maxes at 30%. ((Player's Total PP - 120)x0.1(%) of Natural and Active PP Regen, and PP consumption reduction)

Name: S4:Opposing Skill
Effect: During Brave Stance, frontal Critical Rate is raised by 30%.

Name: S4:Cunning Strike
Effect: While in Wise Stance, increases frontal attack damage by 15%.

Name: S4:Vampiric Strike
Effect: Restore HP equal to 1% of Damage dealt (30 HP MAX).

Name: S4:Gear Reduction
Effect: Decreases rate of Gear Gauge depletion while Katana Gear is active.

Name: S4:Genesis Ring
Effect: The active Element of the Weapon changes to that of the currently equipped "Guard" Skill Ring.

Name: S4:Steadfast Courage
Effect: Become immune to knockback by standing still for 1s.

Name: S4:Lustrous Trap
Effect: Increases PP regenerated by Tactics Trap by 20%.

Name: S4:Dynamic Chain
Effect: When Chain Trigger is activated, gain invincibility for 5 seconds.

Name: S4:Rapid-fire Arrow
Effect: When in Rapid Shoot, increases damage by 3% when equipped with a Bullet Bow.

Name: S4:Refined Providence
Effect: Increases the potency of Element Conversion. (+5% on Different weapon's attribute)

Name: S4:Circuit Rotation
Effect: Decreases the Recast Time of Photon Flare by 20%.

Name: S4:Wand Clobber
Effect: Increases the performance of Wand Normal Attacks. (Attack Speed 1.1x, all hitstop negated)

Name: S4:Support Extension
Effect: The maximum duration of Shifta and Deband becomes 120 seconds.

Name: S5:Release Parry
Effect: Performance changes when Just Guarding with a Weapon Action. Sword only.

Name: S5:Unrivaled Parry
Effect: Consume no Gear for 15s after performing a Just Guard. Increases Power by 2%. Wired Lance only.

Name: S5:Rushing Bolt
Effect: Inflict damage while running. Unleash a shockwave attack when you stop running. Increases Power by 2%. Partizan only.

Name: S5:Shining Cyclone
Effect: PP recovery and consumption changes when your maximum PP falls below 50%. Twin Daggers only.

Name: S5:Evasive Mirage
Effect: Boost Gear Gauge and unleash a counterattack upon successfully blocking an attack with DS Wind Parrying. Increases Power by 2%. Double Saber only.

Name: S5:Evasive Meteor
Effect: Successfully evade an attack with Sway to summon a giant fist. Increases Power by 2%. Knuckles only.

Name: S5:Hangeki Edge
Effect: Increases the damage of Counter by 15%. Generate Braver Gear Gauge when you successfully perform Katana Counter. Increases Power by 2%. Katana only.

Name: S5:Thundering Pursuit
Effect: When using a PA, lightning-charged Photon Blades are generated. (Power: 200%). Dual Blades only.

Name: S5:Mysterious Intent
Effect: Increases Critical Hit Rate by 20%. On a Critical Hit, deal an additional 2% damage and recover 1% of damage dealt as HP (30 MAX).

Name: S5:Mysterious Purpose
Effect: Increases Critical Hit Rate by 20%. On a Critical Hit, deal an additional 2% damage and recover 1% of damage dealt as HP (30 MAX).

Name: S5:Firey End
Effect: Enhance the performance of End Attract with a one minute Recast. Recast resets upon successfully evading an attack with Dive Roll. Increases Power by 2%. Assault Rifle only.

Name: S5:Firey Zero
Effect: Enhance the performance of Zero Distance with a one minute Recast. Recast resets upon successfully evading an attack with Dive Roll. Increases Power by 2%. Launcher only.

Name: S5:Bright Escape
Effect: Successfully evade an attack with Hero Step or Stylish Roll to restore PP. Effect is negated if damage is taken. Twin Machineguns only.

Name: S5:Auxiliary Arrow
Effect: Produces a Chase Arrow when a PA (except Banish Arrow) hits an enemy. Boosts the power of this ability's Chase Arrow for 15 seconds after successfully dodging an attack with Step. Bullet Bow only.

Name: S5:Calming Bullet
Effect: Enhance the performance of Normal Attacks and increases the damage of Rod Shoot by 100%. Rod only.

Name: S5:Speedy Support
Effect: Shorten the charge time of Support Techniques. The power of Zondeel is reduced. Talis only.

Name: S5:Calming Shockwave
Effect: Generates a wave attack on the third Normal Attack. Increases Power by 2%. Wand only.

Name: S5:Rhythmic Pursuer
Effect: Boost the potency of Elemental Burst by 30% and automatically activate Elemental Burst when using a Photon Art. Jet Boots only.

Name: S6:Ironclad Illness
Effect: Become massive for 60 seconds after becoming affected by a status effect.

Name: S6:Heroic Howl
Effect: Enhances the effect of Hero Boost's damage bonus accumulation rate. Does not work with the "Heroic Victory" potential.

Name: S6:Guardian's Essence
Effect: Hunter Weapon Gear and Katana Gear fills while Guarding. No effect if using weapon with "Zephyr's Edge".

Name: S6:Evasion Whistle
Effect: Dodging will cause your Pet to return back to you.

Name: S6:Long Night Star
Effect: Reduces Etoile Boost's decay per second by 50%.

Name: S6:Overlimit
Effect: Increases maximum HP by 50% while Limit Break is active.

Name: S7:Glowing Grace
Effect: Recovers 4 PP per second when standing still for longer than 1 second.

Name: S7:Zenith Impact
Effect: Gain a 10% chance to stun the enemy with a Just Attack.

Name: S7:Increased Efficiency
Effect: Boost the effect of recovery items by 30%.

Name: S7:Mind Merge
Effect: Automatically answers Sympathy requests during Alter Ego. No effect if using weapon with "Glance of Darkness".

Name: S7:Sentinel's Gift
Effect: Upon a successful Tech Charge Parry, recover 5% HP and 10 PP.

Name: S8:Sky Dance's Boon
Effect: Activates Shifta and Deband every 10 seconds when you stay in the air for longer than 2 seconds.

Name: S8:Strong Potency
Effect: Makes you temporarily invincible while drinking a -mate item.

Name: S8:High Minded
Effect: Reduces falling speed while charging a Technique in mid-air.
